name: TheOpinionatedTitos
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Join two Titos on a wild ride of unfiltered opinions. From hot takes on pop culture to fiery debates on basically everything, no topic is off- limits. Get ready for raw, uncensored banter that'll leave you laughing, cringing, and questioning everything. Buckle up for The Opinionated Titos Podcast
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
